entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
